title: Litany In Honour Of St. Clare
content:
LITANY IN HONOUR OF
SAINT CLARE.
Lord, have mercy on us.
Christ, have mercy on us.
Lord, have mercy on us.  Christ, hear us.
Christ, graciously hear us.
God the Father of Heaven,
Have mercy on us.
God the Son, Redeemer of the world,
Have mercy on us.
God the Holy Ghost,
Have mercy on us.
Holy Trinity, One God,
Have mercy on us.
Holy Mary,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, renowned in deed and name,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, brighter than the light,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, great in merits,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, free from the stain of sin,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, bright light illumining the world,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, new luminary,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, star of the heavens,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, renowned virgin,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, saintly virgin,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, prudent virgin,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, shining splendor of Heaven,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, friend of the Cross,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, mourning dove,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, spouse of God,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, disciple of Christ,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, city of the Saviour,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, vessel of purity,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, pattern of obedience,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, model of patience,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, marvel of abstinence,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, prodigy of sanctity,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, mother of poverty,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, flower of virginity,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, palm of fecundity,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, fountain of charity,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, endowed with every virtue,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, guardian of consecrated virgins,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, little plant of the Friars Minor,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, sweetest mistress,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, despising vanities,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, triumphing over the demons,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, most devoted to the Blessed Sacrament,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, emulating our holy father Saint Francis,
Pray for us.
Holy Mother Clare, craving the food of the word of God,
Pray for us.
Lamb of God, Who takest away the sins of the world,
Spare us, O Lord.
Lamb of God, Who takest away the sins of the world,
Graciously hear us, O Lord.
Lamb of God, Who takest away the sins of the world,
Have mercy on us, O Lord.
Christ, hear us.
Christ, graciously hear us.
V. Pray for us, O blessed mother Clare,
R. That we may be made worthy of the promises of Christ.
Let Us Pray.
We beseech Thee, O Lord, that Thy servants
who are renewing the votive commemoration
of Thy holy virgin,
our mother Clare,
may by her intercession
become partakers of the heavenly joys,
and co-heirs with Thine only-begotten Son,
Thou Who livest and reignest,
world without end,
Amen.
O God, Who wast pleased
that our holy mother Saint Clare,
by the splendor of her virtues,
should become a guiding light to innumerable virgins,
grant through her intercession and merits
that those virgins may always walk
in this light here on earth
and may be found worthy
to enjoy the perpetual serenity
of Thy Face in Heaven,
through Jesus Christ Our Lord.
Amen.
